content.question: In line 2, cui quot sunt corpore plumae is translated

choices.label: who has as many feathers on its body
there are as many feathers as bodies
on a body which has many feathers
how many feathers are on its body

content.answer: who has as many feathers on its body

unit.text: 5: Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 4, 6, 7, 11, and 12
